mapper.sql: id, order_id, commodity_id,commodity_name, commodity_type, commodity_price, status, delete_status, order_time, order_user, order_userId
mapper.select: select ct.name, o.id, o.order_id, o.commodity_id, o.commodity_name, o.commodity_type, o.commodity_price, o.status, o.delete_status, o.order_time, o.order_user ,o.order_userId from t_order o left join t_commodity_type ct on o.commodity_type = ct.id where delete_status = 1 order by o.order_time

SELECT

order_id like CONCAT("%",#{keyword},"%") and delete_status = 1
mapper.insert: insert into t_order (id, status, order_id, commodity_id, commodity_price,commodity_name, commodity_type, order_user, order_time, order_userId) values (#{id}, #{status}, #{orderId}, #{commodityId}, #{commodityPrice}, #{commodityName}, #{commodityType}, #{orderUser}, NOW() , #{userId})
mapper.select: select ct.name, o.id, o.order_id, o.commodity_id, o.commodity_name, o.commodity_type, o.commodity_price, o.status, o.delete_status, o.order_time, o.order_user, o.order_userId from t_order o left join t_commodity_type ct on o.commodity_type = ct.id where o.id = #{id} and delete_status = 1
mapper.update: update t_order set delete_status = 0 where id = #{id}
